rules.description: All text must adhere to the defined color contrast rules to ensure readability.

guidelines.rule: Text on a light background (primitive.neutrals.white, primitive.neutrals.lightest, primitive.neutrals.lighter) must be black (primitive.neutrals.darkest).
Text on a dark background (primitive.neutrals.dark, primitive.neutrals.darker, primitive.neutrals.darkest) must be white (primitive.neutrals.white).
Text on a primary color background (semantic.primary, semantic.secondary) must be white (primitive.neutrals.white).

rules.description: All pages must follow a universal content layout.
guidelines: The main page layout must be structured within the `src/app/layout.tsx` file to ensure a consistent structure across all pages.
The universal page layout must contain the following components in this order: Header, optional Breadcrumbs, Page Content, Footer.
Individual page files (e.g., `src/app/about/page.tsx`) should not contain their own <Header>, <Breadcrumbs>, or <Footer> components, as these are provided by the main layout.
The primary content for each page must be wrapped in a <main> tag for semantic correctness and accessibility.

rules.description: All text elements must adhere to the established typography guidelines for consistency.

guidelines.baseStandard: The homepage (`src/app/page.tsx`) is the source of truth for typographic styles. All other pages must be updated to match its standards.

rules.description: All pages must use universal components from the design system. Custom, one-off components should be avoided.
guidelines: Buttons, cards, forms, and other UI elements must be imported from `src/components/ui/`.

If a page uses a custom component, it must be reviewed against the design system for consistency in styling and functionality. If a similar universal component exists, the custom component should be replaced.
All universal components must follow the design tokens defined in `design-system/tokens/design-tokens.json`.
